summary: Building a full business website for 'ImpactFlow', a Social Impact Marketing & Brand Activation Agency. Features branded water bottle distribution campaigns, community-first messaging, and a clean deep blue/emerald green design system. Includes hero, about, water marketing solution, target industries, how it works, social impact, why choose us, and contact sections. Uses Formspree for contact form and CSS/SVG bottle mockup.
architectural_notes: Frontend-only website; contact form uses Formspree integration (user must replace endpoint with their own)
Color palette: Primary Deep Blue (#0B3D91), Accent Emerald Green, Secondary Soft Aqua gradient, Background Clean White
Company name: ImpactFlow — text-based logo in brand colors
Water bottle mockup built as CSS/SVG illustration with customizable label area
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalistic illustration of people at a community outdoor event receiving water bottles, soft warm tones with green and blue accents, modern flat art style (community-event.dim_1200x600.png)
- Abstract water-inspired background with soft deep blue to aqua gradient and faint translucent bottle silhouettes, clean and premium (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive navigation bar with the 'ImpactFlow' brand name styled as a text logo using deep blue (#0B3D91) and emerald green. Include nav links: About, Solutions, Industries, How It Works, Contact. Add a sticky/scroll effect and smooth scroll to sections.

Build a hero section with headline 'Where Marketing Meets Social Impact', subheadline 'We help schools, hospitals, and growing brands connect with communities through purpose-driven offline campaigns.', and two CTA buttons: 'Start a Campaign' (primary) and 'Partner With Us' (secondary outline). Background should be a soft abstract water-inspired gradient (deep blue to soft aqua) with subtle floating bottle silhouettes rendered in CSS/SVG, minimal and modern.

Build an 'About Us' section titled 'Redefining Grassroots Marketing' with the provided body copy and a four-point bullet list: Strategic local outreach, Free community giveaways, Responsible brand messaging, High-trust public engagement. End with the line: 'We believe marketing works best when it benefits both brands and people.'

Build a 'Water Marketing Solution' section titled 'Branded Water Distribution Campaigns' with the provided body copy, a four-point campaign inclusions list, and pricing details (Minimum Order: 25,000 branded bottles, ₹8 per bottle, excluding campaign customization). Include a CSS/SVG illustrated mineral water bottle mockup with a customizable label area, styled minimally in brand colors.

Build a 'Target Industries' section titled 'Built for Impact-Driven Brands' showing five icon cards: Schools & Educational Institutions, Colleges & Coaching Centers, Hospitals & Healthcare Providers, Community Events & Social Campaigns, Local Businesses & Expanding Brands. Each card has an icon and short label. Add tagline: 'We specialize in organizations that serve people across all age groups.'

Build a 'How It Works' section with a clean 5-step process: (1) Campaign Planning, (2) Custom Branding, (3) Production & Quality Check, (4) Targeted Distribution, (5) Campaign Report. Each step has a numbered icon, title, and short description. Include subtle entrance animations (fade-in or slide-in on scroll).

Build a 'Social Impact' section titled 'Marketing With Meaning' with the provided body copy about community utility, hydration, and responsible brand visibility. Include a generated community illustration image as the section visual.

Build a 'Why Choose Us' section with five value proposition points displayed as icon + text cards: Transparent campaign structure, Hyperlocal targeting expertise, Clean and compliant branding, Strong community engagement, Designed for trust-building.

Build a contact section with CTA headline 'Let's Build Impact Together' and a form with fields: Name, Organization, Phone, Email, Campaign Objective (textarea). Integrate the form with Formspree so submissions are sent via POST to a Formspree endpoint. Show a success message after submission. Include a comment in code indicating where to replace the Formspree endpoint URL.

Build a minimal footer with navigation links (About, Solutions, Industries, Contact), social media icon placeholders, and tagline: 'Strategic Marketing. Community Impact.' Style consistently with the deep blue/emerald green brand palette.

Apply a consistent design system across all sections: Primary color deep blue (#0B3D91), accent emerald green, soft aqua gradient as secondary, white background. Use bold sans-serif headings and clean body typography. Add subtle scroll-triggered animations (fade-in) on section entry. Ensure the overall aesthetic is premium, minimal, corporate, and trust-building with no clutter.
Render the generated images (community event illustration and hero background) as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the appropriate sections.
